channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Earth's Wildest Waters: The Big Fish
channel.desc: The seven anglers leave the freezing cold of Iceland for the tropical heat of Cuba - but violent storms make conditions tough. In the salt flats a couple of hours south of Havana they chase the ghostly bonefish, in the Bay of Pigs they must fish Cuban style - on simple tyre tube boats, and finally on the Atlantic Coast they're after giant tarpon, the `silver king'.
